name: 2022 14th International Conference on Wireless Communications and Signal Processing
content: Conference Proceedings: Submissions to WCSP 2022 will be peer reviewed on the basis of technical quality, relevance to conference topics, originality, significance, clarity, etc. Accepted papers will be submitted for inclusion into IEEE Xplore subject to meeting IEEE Xplore's scope and quality requirements. Papers should be in English, strictly not exceeding 5 double-column pages. Use the standard templates for Microsoft Word or LaTeX. Authors of accepted paper are expected to present their papers at the conference.
